J

JIT_YUM_ERROR_COUNT - Static variable in class com.ipt.ebsa.manage.Configuration
 
JitYumUpdateManager - Class in com.ipt.ebsa.manage.deploy.impl
The purpose of this class is to perform the following behaviour: Get a list of packages that need to be in the yum repo Create a CSV file with metadata for those packages SCP the CSV file to the correct yum repo box Poll a directory for output from the createrepo-q-tool If a success then print log and continue, if failure then print log and fail To use this class you must do the following in order: JitYumUpdateManager.setComponents(Map) with the component map used elsewhere JitYumUpdateManager.createRepoQCsv() to create the CSV (can be done in the prepare step #doJitYumRepoUpdate(String) pass the env to we are deploying to, similar to the other deployment classes.
JitYumUpdateManager() - Constructor for class com.ipt.ebsa.manage.deploy.impl.JitYumUpdateManager
 
jobId - Variable in class com.ipt.ebsa.manage.deploy.ApplicationDeployment
